name: Organic Climbing Lunch Bag Chalk Bucket
description: Tape, super glue, brushes and a ton of chalk – bouldering is not without its accoutrement. Keep the essentials in one place with this versatile, handsome bucket. Square base stays put on uneven ground, plus it rolls up tight to prevent your pack from getting regular chalk dustings.Rigid 1000-denier nylon main fabric won't pooch out and lose its shape over time.Large zippered outer pocket houses brushes, tape, or super glue.2 elastic brush loops for your cleaning arsenal.Roll-up design with clip and buckle strap secure chalk in transit.Sorry, no colour choice – all Organic Chalk Bags are made from recycled crash pad trimmings.
